# epilot-validation-rule Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    epilot-validation-rule = {
      source  = "epilot-dev/epilot-validation-rule"
      version = "0.19.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "epilot-validation-rule" {
  epilot_auth = "<YOUR_EPILOT_AUTH>" # Required
  server_url  = "..."                # Optional
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `epilot_auth` (String, Sensitive) Authorization header with epilot OAuth2 bearer token.

### Optional

- `server_url` (String) Server URL (defaults to https://validation-rules.sls.epilot.io)
